name: GG Mana
description:
While Aka Mana's stream is starting, she likes to dodge Playasia mugs and Boss' knives. Why?

Run and duck as long as you can, and get as many points as you can to brag about!

Every 500 points the background changes, and things fly faster at you, can you keep up?

  • Spacebar to jump (hold for higher jump)
  • Down arrow to duck
Credits:
  • Developer: Icefox
  • Art/Animation: 3pmDraw
  • Music: Nobuo Uwumatsu
